Exceptions¶

Module containing all cusstom exceptions used by the package

author

Leandro (Cerberus1746) Benedet Garcia

exception panda_core_data.custom_exceptions.CannotInstanceTemplateDirectly¶

Exception raised if the user attempts to instance a ~Template directly.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

exception panda_core_data.custom_exceptions.DataTypeGroupNotFound¶

Exception raised if the ~Model or ~Template Group is not found.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

exception panda_core_data.custom_exceptions.DataTypeNotFound¶

Exception raised if the ~Model or ~Template Group is not found.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

exception panda_core_data.custom_exceptions.DuplicatedDataTypeName¶

Exception raised if a ~Model or ~Template Type already exists with the same name inside the group.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

exception panda_core_data.custom_exceptions.FolderNotFound¶

Exception raised if the folder is invalid.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)
